p: Morbidity impacts are summarized in S2â€“ S4 Tables. Health impacts are assessed for endpoints including hospital admissions, respiratory symptoms (including asthma), minor restricted activity days, work loss days, and school loss days. Mean estimates of the costs of morbidity impacts vary from $0 to $45 million annually for PM 2.5, $0 to $39 million annually for MDA8 O 3, and $6 million to $18 million for maximum daily 1-hour O 3.
